Cook.notes: TWO separate election authorities, BOTH use custom PDF systems. Cook County Clerk handles county except Chicago. Chicago Board of Election Commissioners handles city only. Largest jurisdiction - critical for coverage.

DuPage.notes: Uses Scytl platform (www.dupageresults.gov), not Clarity Elections. Will require separate scraper.

Kane.notes: Uses custom Kane County platform (electionresults.kanecountyil.gov). Will require separate scraper.

Lake.notes: Uses results.enr.clarityelections.com format. Example from 2024: election_id=122425, web_id=345435

McHenry.notes: Uses connect4.clarityelections.com subdomain format. URL pattern: base_url/election_id/web_id/json/en/

Kendall.notes: Uses Integra Election Reporting Console (same as DeKalb). Also has custom text results site. May appear on platinumelectionresults.com.

Kankakee.notes: Uses results.enr.clarityelections.com format. Example from 2024: election_id=122838

Champaign.notes: County Clerk is sole election authority. Posts results on website, likely as PDFs/spreadsheets in document center. Custom system.

Ford.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Part of the 11-county pollresults cluster.

Livingston.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Part of the 11-county pollresults cluster.

Vermilion.notes: TWO separate election authorities (County Clerk for county except Danville, Danville Election Commission for city), but BOTH use the same pollresults.net URL. Shared platform simplifies scraping.

Boone.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Same platform as Whiteside, Lee, Ogle, Carroll, Putnam, Vermilion, Tazewell, Stephenson, Bureau.

DeKalb.notes: Uses Integra Election Reporting Console. Also appears on Platinum Election Results (platinumelectionresults.com). Will require separate scraper.

Bureau.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Same platform as Whiteside, Lee, Ogle, Carroll, Putnam, Vermilion, Tazewell, Stephenson, Boone.

La Salle.notes: Custom PDF results system. Posts election results as PDF documents.

Putnam.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Shared with Whiteside, Lee, Ogle, and Carroll.

Grundy.notes: Uses GBS Vote (Governmental Business Systems) platform. Will require custom scraper.

Henry.notes: Uses Integra Election Reporting Console (platinumelectionresults.com). Same platform as DeKalb and Kendall.

Lee.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Shared with Whiteside, Ogle, and Carroll.

McLean.notes: TWO separate election authorities. County Clerk (custom text/PDF) handles county except Bloomington. Bloomington Election Commission (Clarity) handles city only.

Ogle.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Also has Integra console: ogle.il.electionconsole.com

Peoria.notes: Uses custom system with PDF results and ArcGIS dashboards. Has ElectionStats database. Not Clarity Elections.

Stark.notes: Custom system posting election results as PDFs.

Stephenson.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Same platform as Whiteside, Lee, Ogle, Carroll, Putnam, Vermilion, Tazewell, Boone, Bureau.

Tazewell.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Same platform as Whiteside, Lee, Ogle, Carroll, Putnam, Vermilion.

Winnebago.notes: TWO separate authorities both on Clarity. County Clerk handles all except City of Rockford. Rockford Board of Elections handles city only. Update all four IDs on election day.

Carroll.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Shared with Whiteside, Lee, and Ogle.

Fulton.notes: Posts election results as PDF documents.

Knox.notes: TWO separate election authorities. Knox County Clerk uses GBS (Governmental Business Systems). Galesburg Board of Elections posts to city website document center.

McDonough.notes: Custom web-based election results system (Logonix Corporation).

Mercer.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Part of the 12-county pollresults cluster.

Rock Island.notes: County Clerk uses GEMS (Global Election Management System). Posts results as PDFs and text files on county website.

Warren.notes: Uses GBS (Governmental Business Systems). Same platform as Knox County Clerk and Grundy County.

Whiteside.notes: Uses pollresults.net (Liberty Systems/CSE Software). Shared with Lee, Ogle, and Carroll counties.

Marshall.notes: Platform unconfirmed. Visit marshallcountyil.gov on election day, find results link, pass to marshall_county_scraper.py --url

Woodford.notes: Woodford County ballot does not include any Shaw Local market races. Confirmed by county clerk. Excluded from all scraping and aggregation.
